entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
